# dismissAddPassesController()

**Instance Method**

Dismisses the pass interface controller

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func dismissAddPassesController()
```

## Discussion

Use this method to dismiss a pass controller you previously displayed using the [doc://com.apple.watchkit/documentation/WatchKit/WKInterfaceController/presentAddPassesController(withPasses:completion:)] method. When dismissing the pass controller programmatically, WatchKit still calls the completion block you provided.

## Adding PassKit passes

- **presentAddPassesController(withPasses:completion:)**: Displays a modal interface for presenting passes to the user.
